criteria.name: Commits
criteria.explanation: The user has a perfect score for commits, indicating a high volume of contributions.

criteria.name: Code Quality
criteria.explanation: The user has a moderate score for code quality, suggesting room for improvement.

criteria.name: Recent Work Consistency
criteria.explanation: The user shows strong consistency in recent work, indicating regular and sustained activity.

score_calculation_details: Computed as an unweighted average of the individual criteria scores (10 + 5 + 9) / 3 = 8.0. Equal weights were assumed as no specific weights were provided.
additional_notes_from_input: Information regarding total number of repositories, followers, stars, contribution graph, last commit date, stars, forks, and open/closed issues could not be explicitly extracted from the crawled content. Several sections of the contribution graph indicated loading errors.
